description.narrative: Country Programme Management and Coordination, which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Cross-Sectoral Adolescent Development, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation And Research, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Unicef Capacity For Programming On Gender. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, there is an inclusive and protective legal and policy environment and improved state accountability for the realization of children's rights

mailing-address.narrative: No. 81 A Tran Quoc Toan Ha Noi Viet Nam

sector.narrative: Building global / regional / national stakeholder evaluation capacity

title.narrative: Vietnam Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change
UNICEF Policy on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF Procedure on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF procedure for programme implementation partnerships
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace

2018 Vietnam: External After Action Review of the Government of Viet Nam and UNICEF emergency response supporting children and women in 10 provinces in Viet Nam affected by drought and salt water intrusion crisis (2016-2017)
Vietnam 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The implementation of 2019 annual work plans was on-track towards the set targets. As part of the country programme's mid-term review, RAM indicators and targets at output and outcome and levels were reviewed and some adjusted to be better consistent and aligned to CPD's expected results. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: A new partnership mechanism for fund mobilization is explored, proposed, and advocated for adoption.

actual.value: 2020:The review on Viet Nam's national legal and political environment in relation to partnership with the private sector on development issues and the best interests of children was completed.

title.narrative: Expected results of UNICEF CPD are planned, monitored, and reviewed using an RMB approach.

baseline.value: Results and Resources Framework is available for monitoring and coordination

target.value: 2021:Expected results of CPD are coordinated across sections for achievement.

actual.value: 2019:As part of the mid-term review of the Country Programme Document (CPD) 2017-2021 of UNICEF Viet Nam in cooperation with the Government of Viet Nam, the RAM indicators of the CPD at outcome and output levels were reviewed and adjusted to better consistent and aligned to the CPD's expected result.
